message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper deals with natural language processing and text matching to identify high-quality comments, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
2. cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper involves the task of filtering out low-quality comments, which can be seen as an information retrieval problem.
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The proposed multi-target text matching model involves the use of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to assess the quality of comments.
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a novel multi-target text matching model, which involves the use of machine learning techniques to measure the quality of comments.
5. cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper deals with the issue of online comments containing misleading and unwelcome information, which has implications for the societal impact of technology.
